Provo.Olmsted Station Powerhouse:
The Olmsted Power Station is a historic building located in Orem, Utah, United States. It is listed on the National Register of Historic Places.


== Olmsted Station Power House * Off U.S. Highway 189 * Provo, Utah ==
The Olmsted Station Power House was built in 1904, by L. L. Nunn and his brother and chief engineer, P. N. Nunn.
